content.rendered:
Annual gifts to the University of La Verne go to work immediately. They have a powerful effect on the university – this week, this month, this year. When you give to University of La Verne, you are a part of something bigger; you join thousands of other donors who are investing in the University of La Verne’s great young minds. Your support helps to fuel new academic initiatives and programs, enhances campus life, and provides vital scholarship support for students. Annual gifts start by opening doors, an action that opens possibilities, thus changing the world!

Parents and Family Giving

Parents and family gifts to the University of La Verne’s Parent and Family Fund benefit programs such as those in the Division of Student Affairs that supports the success and well-being of all students, including health services, career services, and new student programs. Learn more about our parent giving by contacting Alanzo Moreno, Director of  Leadership and Annual Giving, at (909) 448-4685.

Students, Faculty, and Staff Giving

Achieve

You can support fellow Leos and fund your passions by making a gift of any amount through the university’s crowdfunding platform, ACHIEVE. Your support allows University of La Verne students and faculty to embark on a world of possibilities, improve lives through innovation, inspire social change, and more. Click here for additional information.

Advancement Ambassadors

Each year, a group of University of La Verne students known as Advancement Ambassadors help to strengthen the network of alumni, parents, and friends by offering a special opportunity to support the university. This successful program works to generate funding for programs such as student scholarships and student services.  Through the calling program, students are able not only to update the caller’s information but also give current news about the university. The program offers students the opportunity to grow professionally and develop both communication and fundraising skills. Our callers are eager to talk to you and share their personal La Verne experience!

Students interested in applying to become an Advancement Ambassador should contact Alanzo Moreno, Director of  Leadership and Annual Giving.

Faculty and Staff Giving

Employees of the University of La Verne show their Leo Love through their generous personal gifts. Payroll giving is a convenient way for employees to make gifts directly and automatically from their paychecks. The road to inspiration is paved with generosity, compassion, and the desire to improve the world; thank you for fueling imagination and creativity and inspiring students to be bold. To start your payroll deduction, visit our online form here or you may download a paper form here.
